_sText:
I think the map name explains itself.

The map has :
~40 Spawns (like all my maps) Ct=20 T=20
~12 Cells
~Guns Available : Ak47, M4A1, M249 (Hidden), Elites, Deagle, Flash bangs, Grenades, Smoke Grenades, Awps, Scouts and full armor.
~3 Hidden Rooms
~Much detail
~Football pitch
~Sea (instead of pool)
~Cage (ofc)
~A clock ?! Never seen that befure have you ? =)
~1 Secret room

NOTE : Last two screen shots are missing some things from the "newer" version but it gives you the idea befure you get to play the actual map.
__________________________________________________________
Update :
~It is now possible to climb onto the showers in the shower room. (No need fur another player to boost.)
~Added new song instead of the old one.
~Fixed armory bug when getting additional armor.
~Added lasers to new dual elites (with infinite ammo) and to the m249 that is hidden.
~Fixed football pitch. The ball can no longer leave the pitch.
~Fixed the water.
~Redid the secret room to get onto the walls using the secret door from cell #1.
~Added a ladder next to the cage.
